body.name: GOFLAME 3-Tier Folding Bookshelf Set of 2, Freestanding Convertible Shelving Unit with Wheels, Height-Adjustable Shelves, Metal Frame, Industrial Storage Shelf Organizer, Bookcase Display Rack
features: Folding Design & Easy Installation: With its unique foldable design, the storage shelf can be folded into a compact size for space saving. Additionally, the necessary tools are included in the package, making it convenient and hassle-free to assemble.

Easy Movement & Clean: Equipped with 4 universal wheels (2 with brakes), this shelving unit provides easy movement and stability. The lockable wheels ensure that the rack stays in place when needed. Additionally, the rack is easy to clean, you can wipe it with a damp cloth.

Multifunctional Storage Rack: This 3-tier bookcase comes with adjustable shelves that can accommodate a variety of items such as books, potted plants, storage baskets, tableware, snacks or small kitchen appliances. Plus, if you have 2 sets of this folding racks, you can splice them and use together.

Selected Material & Sturdy Frame: Crafted with durable MDF panels and metal pipes, this folding bookcase is built to last. It can withstand a weight of up to 135 lbs in total. Moreover, the X-shaped design adds extra support, and the anti-tipping device can ensure safety and steadiness.

Suitable for Various Scenarios: This versatile display rack can serve as a microwave oven stand, bookshelf, baker's rack or office storage rack. Whether it's in the living room, kitchen, bedroom or office, it is the perfect choice to meet your daily needs.
body.description: Description:Are you in need of extra storage space to avoid messy environment? Our 3-tier shelving unit is the perfect option for you. Its convenient folding design allows for easy expansion or folding as needed. Once unfolded, it provides 3 storage shelves to accommodate a variety of sundries. Additionally, all shelves can be assembled in 7 different positions, allowing for customizable storage based on your needs. If you require more vertical storage space, simply detach several shelves. Furthermore, our bookshelf is equipped with 4 universal wheels, making it easy to transport items from one place to another. Besides, 2 of wheels are lockable, ensuring the rack stays in place. Most importantly, this bookcase comes with anti-toppling device to maximize steadiness and security.Features:Adjustable shelves for a variety of itemsThe splicing design and DIY function for versatilityCustomize your own storage rack per your preferenceFolding in a compact size for space savingNecessary tools included for easy assembly4 wheels for easy mobility2 lockable wheels make the storage shelf stand in place when needed.Crafted with MDF panels and metal frame, can withstand up to 135 lbsCan be fixed to the wall with anti-toppling device to increase safetyPerfect for living room, kitchen, bedroom or office useSpecifications:Color: Black, Rustic BrownMaterial: MDF, MetalUnfolded Dimension: 30” x 14” x 34” (L x W x H)Folded Dimension: 14” x 3” x 34” (L x W x H)Total Weight Capacity: 135 lbsNet Weight of 2 bookshelves: 33 lbsPackage includes:2 x Folding Bookshelf1 x User Manual
